thread.title: New catalyst catches the sun by improving artificial photosynthesis

title: New catalyst catches the sun by improving artificial photosynthesis
text:
New catalyst catches the sun by improving artificial photosynthesis 3:28am IST - 01:50 
A group of researches in the United States and China say their new dual-atom catalyst improves artificial photosynthesis - the ability to store the sun's energy the way plants do. Elly Park reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A group of researches in the United States and China say their new dual-atom catalyst improves artificial photosynthesis - the ability to store the sun's energy the way plants do. Elly Park reports.
